prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of Stephen Philip Holt, 1869-1948, Accession #7687-b, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This addition to the Papers of Stephen Philip Holt was originally deposited by Mr. Holt on 20 November 1964. It was withdrawn by Mr. Holt's executor on 2 August 1974, and was re-deposited by Mr. David J. Wood, et al, in October 1974 for safekeeping and general historical reference

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This addition to the Papers of Stephen Philip Holt consists collection consists of

did.unittitle: "Valley Manuscript," by Margaret Lynn Lewis of Loch Lynn, Scotland 1869
Correspondence from various people re: the "Valley Manuscript" 1939 August - 1940 February
Newspaper clipping, "Bogus Portrait Supplements Old 'Valley Manuscript' Hoax" 1948 February 15
The Castle of Dreams, by Mary Miller Holt n.d.
